contents: Will the Minister of TRIBAL AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) the details of schemes that have been executed by the Government during the last seven years in order to boost employment generation in tribal areas; (b) whether employment opportunities have increased due to such schemes; (c) if so, the details thereof; (d) the State-wise details of persons benefitted therefrom; and (e) the steps taken regarding tribal areas of Rajasthan?

topic: Disbursement of Funds under DBT Schemes
contents: Will the Minister of FINANCE be pleased to state: (a) the details of funds disbursement in West Bengal under various DBT schemes of the Central Government during COVID lockdown period from March 2010 - till date (b) the details of disbursement of funds in Darjeeling and Kalimpong districts of West Bengal under various DBT schemes of the Central Government during the said period; and (c) the details of financial assistance provided to West Bengal for economic revival and post-Covid lockdown?

Will the Minister of TRIBAL AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) the salient features of Vanbandhu Kalyan Yojana; (b) whether the Government has received any proposal under Special Central Assistance to Tribal Sub Scheme and Vanbandhu Kalyan Yojana from Maharashtra including Nagpur and Amaravati Region from the year 2015-16 to 2020-21; (c) if so, the details thereof; (d) the proposal and date-wise present status of the said proposals; (e) whether the said proposals are still lying pending with the Government for approval; and 38 (f) if so, the reasons therefor and the time by which funds are likely to be released after approving the said proposals?

contents: Will the Minister of ENVIRONMENT, FOREST AND CLIMATE CHANGE , be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has assessed the impact of climate change on agriculture productivity and elevated health risk during the recent past and if so, the details thereof; (b) the steps taken/being taken by the Government in this regard (c) the details of the target set and achievements made so far and whether it is upto the set target and if not, the reasons therefor; and (d) whether the Government has organized vulnerability mapping of Indian states in line with climate change and if so, the details thereof along with the financial assistance provided in this regard?

topic: Working from Home due to Lockdown
contents: Will the Minister of LABOUR AND EMPLOYMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has received employer related complaints from the employees working from home due to lockdown during the last two years; (b) whether those employees have been forced to work beyond the prescribed time limit; (c) whether there has been deduction of salary, facilities or other forms of honorariums of employees working from home, if so, the details of such companies; and (d) the manner in which the monitoring is being carried out by the Government to protect the interest of the employees working from home?

topic: Encroachment of Hindu Temples in South India
contents: Will the Minister of CULTURE be pleased to state: (a) the number of Hindu temples are registered in South India and out of these the number of temples that are under the Government administration and private management; (b) the details of those Hindu temples that are under encroachment in above both category; (c) the details of the instructions given by the Government of India to the State Governments to remove the encroachments from the temples in South India; and (d) whether these instructions have been followed and if not, the reason therefor?

Will the Minister of LABOUR AND EMPLOYMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether it is a fact that the Government does not maintain the records of complaints regarding non- payment of wages to the workers/labourers, if so, the details thereof; 42 (b) the reaction of the Government in this regard and the rules made to take action against the contractors and firms for non-payment of wages; and (c) if not, the basis on which stategy related to the welfare of the workers is made in the absence of the above records?

Will the Minister of LABOUR AND EMPLOYMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has State-wise data of unemployed people; (b) if so, the details thereof, State/UT-wise including Haryana; (c) whether the Government has run any scheme for the creation of new employment opportunities in Haryana during the last five years and if so, the details thereof; (d) the number of people who got employment in Haryana under these schemes during the last five years; and (e) the details of unemployment in Haryana during the last five years, year-wise? NEW DELHI; November 24, 2021 Agrahayana 3, 1943 (Saka) .

Will the Minister of FINANCE be pleased to state: (a) the reason behind the reduction in the allocation of Budget 2021-22 for the Department of Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities from Rs. 1325 crore to Rs. 1171 crore; and (b) the number of people with disabilities benefited from the Prime Ministers Special Economic and Comprehensive Package of Rs. 20 lakh crores as announced in May 2020?

Will the Minister of FINANCE be pleased to state: (a) whether it is a fact that loans worth Rs. 1.5 lakhs crores were written off by Banks in the first nine months of the current financial year; (b) if so, the details thereof; and (c) the names and amounts of major corporates whose loans were written off during the said period? UTPAL KUMAR SINGH Secretary General

Will the Minister of FISHERIES, ANIMAL HUSBANDRY AND DAIRYING , be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has taken cognizance of low milk production by indigenous cow progeny; (b) if so, the details of efforts being made for improving the indigenous cow breeds in the country including the Bundelkhand region; and (c) the details of target set for creation of employment through animal husbandry in the Bundelkhand region?

Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) the details of assurances made to Andhra Pradesh as per the provisions of the Andhra Pradesh Reorganisation Act, 2014; (b) the details of the status of fulfillment or non- fulfillment of each of these assurances; (c) the details along with reasons for non-fulfillment of the assurances which havent been fulfilled as of today; (d) the date by which the Government is planning to fulfill the non-fulfilled assurances of the Act; (e) the details of the unfulfilled provisions and assurances which require the consensus of the Government of Andhra Pradesh and the Government of Telangana; and (f) the time by which and how special category status is proposed to be granted to Andhra Pradesh? .

topic: Crop Damage due to Heavy Rains
contents: Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) the value of agricultural and horticultural crops damaged due to heavy rains in various parts of the country during the current rainy season; (b) whether the Government has conducted any survey in this regard and if so, the details thereof; (c) whether the Government has received any request from the State Governments for providing assistance to compensate for the loss suffered by farmers and if so, the details thereof along with the funds released, State/ UT-wise; and (d) the other steps taken by the Government to cover the loss of life, property and livestock suffered by farmers?

Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has made any changes in the criteria relating to natural disaster relief and if so, the details thereof; (b) whether the Government proposes to allow the disaster affected persons to receive assistance at district level in a time bound manner as per the prevalent procedure and if so, the details thereof; (c) whether the Government has received any such proposal and if so, the details thereof along with the action taken by the Government thereon; (d) whether the Government proposes to provide any special assistance as per immediate requirement in the matter of such urgent cases; and (e) if so, the details thereof? 7

Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) the quantum of Nirbhaya Funds allocated and utilised since 2014, State-wise; and (b) the quantum of Nirbhaya Funds allocated and utilised to implement the Safe City Component of the Nirbhaya Scheme, city-wise, since 2014?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has distributed hybrid seed mini kits to farmers across the country; (b) if so, the details thereof; (c) whether the seeds have been distributed in Andhra Pradesh; and (d) if so, the details thereof and if not, the reasons therefor?

contents: Will the Minister of HEAVY INDUSTRIES be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government is encouraging establishment of heavy industries in various parts of the country including backward regions; (b) if so, the details thereof, State/UT-wise; and (c) the steps being taken by the Government to establish more and more heavy industries to provide employment and to stop migration of people from one part to other parts of the country?

topic: Disaster Relief through NDRF and SDRF
from: ['Rajenimbalkar, Shri Omprakash Bhupalsingh alias Pavan', 'Bhavana Gawali (Patil), Ms.']
contents: Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) whether National Disaster Response Fund (NDRF) and State Disaster Response Fund (SDRF) have been set up jointly by the Union Government/State . Governments to provide relief to the persons affected by natural disasters in States; (b) if so, the present status thereof; (c) whether the Union Government has fixed the rates for State Disaster Response Fund (SDRF) during the period from the year 2015 to 2020; (d) if so, the steps being taken by the Government to increase the said rate; (e) whether any proposal relating to increase in the said rate has been received from the State Government of Maharashtra and if so, the action taken by the Government thereon; and (f) the details of funds released by the Union Government in this regard during the last five years?

Will the Minister of FISHERIES, ANIMAL HUSBANDRY AND DAIRYING , be pleased to state: (a) the details of steps taken/being taken by the Government for the sustainable development of the fisheries sector; (b) whether it is a fact that the fishermen in the country were against privatization of fisheries resources and if so, the details thereof; (c) whether the Government is aware of the fact that fishermen in the country have risen as one against the draft policy framework on Indias blue economy which envisages using marine resources for development and if so, the details thereof; and (d) whether the Government has taken any decision regarding Draft Blue Economy Policy for the country, if so, the details thereof including the expected date of execution and if not, the current status thereof?

Will the Minister of INFORMATION AND BROADCASTING be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has taken initiatives to fact-check the content circulated on various platforms; (b) if so, the details thereof; (c) whether the Government has set up any fact- checking cell and if so, the details thereof; (d) whether the Government has taken any action against any news organization/content-generating platforms for circulation of fake news/rumours or misleading information; and (e) if so, the details thereof? 8

Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) the features of the Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Scheme (MGNREGS); (b) the details of the funds sanctioned, allocated and utilized under this Scheme within the State of Tamil Nadu during the last three years; (c) whether the Government asked the States to create three Fund Transfer Orders (FTOs) for the MGNREGS workers belonging to different castes and if so, the reasons therefor; (d) whether the Government is aware about poor remuneration and late payments under this programme after implementation of three FTOs; and (e) whether the Government is also aware that the differential payment system has come when rural areas in the country in particular have been severely hit by two consecutive waves of the pandemic, which led to widespread job losses?

Will the Minister of HEAVY INDUSTRIES be pleased to state: (a) the details of public and private sector heavy industries set up in various States/UTs, particularly in Telangana during each of the last three years and the current year; (b) the number of families displaced due to setting up of such industries during the said period; (c) the number of families, out of them, rehabilitated in such States/UTs so far, State/UT-wise; and (d) the number of displaced persons employed directly and indirectly in such industries so far, State/ UT-wise particularly in Telangana?

Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government plans to extend the Shyama Prasad Mukherji Rurban Mission (SPMRM) to more clusters in Haryana; (b) if so, the details thereof and if not, the reasons therefor; and . (c) the status of projects in the clusters approved under said scheme in Haryana along with the details of amenities planned/completed in these clusters as of June, 2021?

Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) whether there is an increase in number of custodial deaths of SC and ST children in the country; (b) if so, the total number of such cases registered during each of the last three years and current year, State-wise, and gender-wise; (c) if so, the steps taken by the Government against the accused officials during the said period; (d) whether the directions of the National Human Rights Commission and State right panels have been ignored by the State Governments regarding detention of minors; and (e) if so, the details of steps being taken to tackle such incidents in future ?

topic: Financial Assistance to Kin of Persons died due to COVID-19
from: ['Kathir Anand, Shri Durai Murugan', 'A. Raja, Shri']
contents: Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) the number of persons who died due to COVID- 19 in the country from March, 2020, State-wise; (b) whether the Union Government has any plans to provide financial assistance from National Disaster Relief Fund (NDRF) to the kith and kin of the people who died due to COVID-19; (c) if so, the details thereof and if not the reasons therefor; (d) whether the Supreme Court has issued guidelines for payment of compensation to the next of kin of persons who died due to COVID-19; and (e) if so, the details thereof?

from: ['Bhamre, Dr. Subhash Ramrao', 'Singh, Shri Rajiv Ranjan Alias Lalan Singh', 'Antony, Shri Anto', 'Yadav, Shri Dinesh Chandra']
contents: Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) the number of farmers suicides reported during the last three years and the current year in the State of Maharashtra and the reasons for their suicide; (b) whether the Government has carried out any study to assess the causes of suicides by farmers, if so, the details of the findings, if any; (c) the details of funds allocated and expenditure incurred on various schemes in the State of Maharashtra during the last three years and the current year for the welfare of the farmers and to mitigate the crisis of farmers suicides; (d) whether the Government has noticed reports that the several farmers have committed suicide due to unavailability of fertilizers in the country especially in Madhya Pradesh; (e) if so, the details of number of farmers committed suicide so far, State-wise; (f) whether the Government has any plan to give compensation to the family of the victims;and (g) the steps taken by the Government to avoid/ prevent farmers distress/suicides in various States of the country?
party: ['Bharatiya Janata Party', 'Janata Dal (United)', 'Indian National Congress', 'Janata Dal (United)']

contents: Will the Minister of FISHERIES, ANIMAL HUSBANDRY AND DAIRYING , be pleased to state: (a) whether the Pradhan Mantri Mastya Sampada Yojana introduced to boost fish and aquatic products and their marketing and infrastructure support has been achieving its objectives; (b) if so, the details thereof; and (c) the status of implementation of the scheme in the State of Andhra Pradesh as on date?

from: ['Chaudhary, Shri P.P.', 'Solanky, Shri Mahendra Singh', 'Yadav, Dr. Krishnapal Singh', 'Ray, Smt. Sandhya', 'Gupta, Shri Sangamlal Kadedin']
contents: Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has conducted any study to estimate the loss of fertility and nutrients in soil in places affected by drought, water scarcity etc; (b) if so, the details thereof particularly in Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh and Uttar Pradesh; (c) the details of districts in above States found to be facing challenges in terms of soil fertility; (d) whether the Government proposes to introduce measures to increase soil health and fertility and if so, the details thereof; and (e) the details of any assistance extended to farmers who suffer loss due to infertile soil in their field?

contents: Will the Minister of YOUTH AFFAIRS AND SPORTS be pleased to state: (a) the salient features of Khelo India centres; (b) whether the Government has opened/proposes to open Khelo India centres across the country; (c) if so, the details of such centres established and yet to be established across the country including NCT of Delhi, district-wise; (d) the details of the availability of trainers and equipment facility in the district level Khelo India centres and the talented players selected so far, district-wise; and (e) whether the Government has any policy to encourage sports amongst Tribals and Rural areas of the country and if so, the details in this regard?

topic: Armed Conflicts in North East Region
contents: Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has the data of armed conflicts occuring in North East Region; (b) if so, the number of such conflicts since 2014 in NE between insurgents/ militants and armed forces or between various militant groups, year-wise; (c) whether the Government has the data of casualties among armed forces, militants and civilians; (d) if so, the details thereof during the last five years, State-wise; (e) whether the Government has the data of funds it spent on military operations in North East Region during the said period; and (f) if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of FISHERIES, ANIMAL HUSBANDRY AND DAIRYING , be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has any special plans to motivate persons engaged in river/ lake/pond fishing and provide incentives for keeping them commercially alive in this field; and (b) if so, the details thereof and the incentive schemes provided to support river/lake/pond fishing in the country, particularly in the State of Maharashtra?

from: ['Siddeshwara, Shri Gowdar Mallikarjunappa', 'Mahajan, Smt. Poonam Pramod']
contents: Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) the details of number of Master Canteens and Subsidiary Canteens functioning for serving and retired Central Armed Police Forces (CAPF) personnel; (b) whether Government has taken any steps to provide quality products in Central Police Canteen (CPc) and also at a subsidised rate as was in the case of CSD canteen for defence personnel and if so, the details thereof and the action taken in this regard; and 51 (c) whether Government has decided to sell only indigenous products in CPC and if so, the details thereof and the objective behind the move along with the time by which this will be made functional?

from: ['Bhabhor, Shri Jaswantsinh Sumanbhai', 'Saraswati, Shri Sumedhanand', 'Patel, Smt. Keshari Devi', 'Katara, Shri Kanakmal', 'Koli, Smt. Ranjeeta', 'Shrangare, Shri Sudhakar Tukaram', 'Nath, Shri Balak']
contents: Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government propose to provide funds for start-ups in agriculture and its related sectors in the country, if so, the details thereof; (b) the status of agriculture startup in the country till date; (c) the ways and means by which Government will promote agriculture start-ups in rural and tribal areas of Gujarat so that farmers of those areas be uplifted; (d) the number of agro startups set-up during the last two years along with the details of the financial assistance provided to them in Uttar Pradesh including district Prayagraj and in Rajasthan including district Band-Durgapur; (e) the details of the relaxation given to set up agro start-ups in rural areas; (f) the details of the schemes formulated by the Government keeping in view the demand of agro/products in international market; and (g) the details of the assistance provided by the Government to promote innovation in products and service of agro start-ups?
party: ['Bharatiya Janata Party', 'Bharatiya Janata Party', 'Bharatiya Janata Party', 'Bharatiya Janata Party', 'Bharatiya Janata Party', 'Bharatiya Janata Party', 'Bharatiya Janata Party']

topic: Process of Fund Transfer Order under MGNREGS
contents: Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has any stipulated time limit to process the Fund Transfer Order (FTO) to transfer wages directly to the workers accounts after receiving Fund Transfer Order (FTO) from the State Governments under Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Scheme (MNREGS), if so, the details thereof; (b) the details of average days of time taken to process the Fund Transfer Orders by the Government each month from 01.01.2021 to 31.10.2021 State-wise; . (c) the details of the utilization of the allocated funds of MNREGS for financial year 2021-2022 State- wise and the steps taken by the Government to handle the payments of the States that used 100% funds, waiting for extra allocation; and (d) the details of the work demanded by the workers to work provided by the Government, State-wise in this financial year 2021-2022?

from: ['Patil, Shri Unmesh Bhaiyyasaheb', 'Shinde, Dr. Shrikant Eknath', 'Gavit, Dr. Heena Vijaykumar', 'Mane, Shri Dhairyasheel S.', 'Vikhepatil, Dr. Sujay Radhakrishna']
contents: Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) the amount of Central Financial Assistance disbursed under the Assistance to States for Modernisation of Police Scheme and the details thereof, State-wise; (b) the criteria employed for the bifurcation of States into Category A and B and the disparity in funding received by the two; (c) the amount of extra funding in the form of Better Performance Incentives allocated, sanctioned and disbursed under the scheme as on date and to which States; (d) the criteria employed to decide which States are entitled to receive better Performance Incentives; and (e) the list, number and monetary value of items provided as assistance in kind to the police forces State-wise?
party: ['Bharatiya Janata Party', 'Shiv Sena', 'Bharatiya Janata Party', 'Shiv Sena', 'Bharatiya Janata Party']

contents: Will the Minister of SOCIAL JUSTICE AND EMPOWERMENT be pleased to state: (a) the funds released to various States for the welfare of Persons with Disabilities (PwDs) during the last three years, year-wise; specially in the State of Maharshtra; (b) the new schemes formulated for the welfare of Persons with Disabilities; and (c) the fresh steps taken by the Government to increase job avenues for the PwDs across the country?

Will the Minister of FOOD PROCESSING INDUSTRIES be pleased to state: (a) the details of the mega and mini food parks, cold storage chains infrastructure and food testing laboratories set up under Pradhan Mantri Kisan Sampada Yojana (PMKSY), State-wise including Chhattisgarh; (b) the details of the financial allocation made to improve the food processing infrastructure under the said scheme, State-wise; (c) whether the Government has made any assessment regarding the number of farmers benefitted/ being benefitted from the said scheme; (d) if so, the details thereof; and (e) the details of the employment opportunities generated through this scheme especially in rural areas?

topic: Negative Net Balance Sheet under MGNREGS
from: ['Tagore B., Shri Manickam', 'Sawant, Shri Arvind Ganpat']
contents: Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether it is a fact that the Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee scheme has negative balance sheet and run out of funds half way particularly through the current fiscal and shows a negative net balance of Rs.8686 crore; (b) whether it is also true that many States show a negative net balance forcing the State Governments to close down halfway through the year; (c) whether the Government is aware that the MGNREGS is a demand driven scheme, if so, whether the Government anticipate funds required for the scheme and allocate the funds to all States; (d) whether the MGNREGS workers are getting late payments due to the shortage of funds and that a good percentage of households who demanded work under the scheme were not provided work and many States were not able to pay the wages for the work completed; and (e) if so, the steps taken by the Government in this regard?

Will the Minister of COOPERATION be pleased to state: (a) whether the introduction of the new Ministry of Cooperation is an effort to monitor the cooperatives of the country; . (b) if so, whether the Ministry found loopholes in the existing system and is it an innovation to stream-line the functioning of Cooperative Banks in the country, if so, the details thereof and (c) whether the Government is considering new rules for District Central Cooperative Banks, if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Fiji for the development of the agricultural sector, recently in June 2021; and (b) if so, the details of the benefits likely to accrue to both the countries as a result of the above said MoU?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has any plan to support farmers for the losses suffered during the pandemic and flood in Odisha; (b) if so, the details thereof; and (c) whether the Government will extend support with farm loan waiver or provide seeds and fertilizers to the farmers, if so, the details of the same?

Will the Minister of FOOD PROCESSING INDUSTRIES be pleased to state: (a) the initiatives that are being undertaken by the Government to support Farmer Producer Organisations, Self Help Groups (SHGs) and Producer Cooperatives to promote products identified through the One District One Product (ODOP) approach in Kerala along with the details of the products identified for Wayanad parliamentary constituency; (b) the details of applications received under PM Formalisation of Micro Food Processing Enterprises (PM-FME) Scheme in Kerala, district-wise; 53 (c) the details of credit linked grant and seed capital provided to FPOs/SHGs and Producer Cooperatives under PM-FME scheme, State-wise; (d) whether the capacity building initiatives are being undertaken to strengthen FPOs, SHGs and Producer Cooperatives; and (e) if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of PANCHAYATI RAJ be pleased to state: (a) whether any mechanism has been developed within the Panchayati Raj Institutions to prepare district plans and to monitor the works executed by Gram Panchayats; (b) if so, the details thereof; (c) whether some Panchayats in the country have expressed their inability to utilize funds earmarked for them due to non-availability of district plans; (d) if so, the details thereof; (e) whether the Government has issued any instructions to the Panchayats in this regard; and (f) if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of COOPERATION be pleased to state: (a) whether Kendriya Bhandar, a multi-State cooperative society has recruited Group B and C staff through interview violating DOPT OM No. 39020/01/ 2013-Estt( (b) dated 9.10.2015 and Central Registrar of Cooperative Societiess Circular No. R-ll017/l9/2017 L&M dated 3.7.2017, if so, the details thereof;; (b) whether Kendriya Bhandar has also violated Articles 14 and 16 of the Indian Constitution in the matter of regular appointments made without conducting written tests, if so, the details thereof; (c) whether Central Registrar has received complaints in this regard, if so, the details thereof; and (d) the details of action taken to scrap illegal appointments made in violation of the Articles 14 & 16 of the Indian Constitution and DoPT OM etc.?

topic: MoU with Flipkart under National Rural Livelihood Mission
from: ['Reddy, Shri P.V. Midhun', 'Rangaiah, Shri Talari', 'Nallakonda Gari, Shri Reddeppa', 'Reddy, Shri Adala Prabhakara']
contents: Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has signed a Memorandum of Understanding(MoU) with Flipkart for partnership under the National Rural Livelihood Mission; (b) if so, the details thereof; (c) whether the Government has marketed the products earlier through State owned online E-commerce Platform as well as other commercial E-commerce Platforms; and (d) if so, the details thereof?
party: ['Yuvajana Sramika Rythu Congress Party', 'Yuvajana Sramika Rythu Congress Party', 'Yuvajana Sramika Rythu Congress Party', 'Yuvajana Sramika Rythu Congress Party']

contents: Will the Minister of FISHERIES, ANIMAL HUSBANDRY AND DAIRYING , be pleased to state: (a) the details of efforts being made by the Government for carrying out permanent technical- organizational restructure in fisheries and aquaculture extension of fishermen and fish farmers in the country; (b) whether the fishermen are not able to expand their profession in the dearth of knowledge; (c) the details of measures being adopted by the Government in this regard; (d) the extent to which the freshwater fishing can be beneficial in the production of fisheries; (e) the details thereof; and (f) the methodology through which technical knowhow could be extended to the fishermen in the State of Gujarat so that they may augment their production?

topic: PMGSY-III in Kerala and Tamil Nadu
contents: Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) the features of the Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana Phase-III; (b) the details of roads proposed to lay under this phase within Tamil Nadu and Kerala, district-wise; (c) the details of fund sanctioned, allocated and released to the State of Tamil Nadu and Kerala along with the details of fund utilized and works completed under PMGSY-III in the State; and 54 (d) whether the Government has fixed any target in this regard, if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of FISHERIES, ANIMAL HUSBANDRY AND DAIRYING , be pleased to state: (a) the details of funds allocated and utilized for fisheries in the State of Andhra Pradesh under Blue Revolution: Integrated Development and Management of Fisheries Scheme during the last three years; (b) the details of facilities provided to fishermen under various fisheries schemes; and (c) the details of the developments in the State of Andhra Pradesh in employment generation and fish production during the last three years?

topic: Construction of Stadium to Promote Sports
contents: Will the Minister of YOUTH AFFAIRS AND SPORTS be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government proposes to construct stadiums at district/block/panchayat level in the States to promote sports in the country; (b) if so, the details thereof along with the details of the progress made in this regard so far; and (c) the details of the number of stadiums constructed so far at block/panchayat level in the country during the last two years, State-wise including Katihar, Jehanabad, Gaya and Arwal district of the state of Bihar?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether any scheme is being run by the Government to provide information to the farmers regarding latest agriculture techniques; (b) if so, the details thereof; and (c) the total number of farmers benifitted under said scheme in the State of Uttar Pradesh, district-wise?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) the schemes being implemented by the Government to reduce agricultural costs along with the details thereof; (b) the budget allocated for the said schemes and the amount spent thereon during the last five years; (c) the number of farmers who benefitted from the said schemes along with the details thereof; and (d) the details of reduction in cost of agriculture per hectare by implementation of the schemes and the amount of increase in the income of farmers for the last five years?

Will the Minister of FISHERIES, ANIMAL HUSBANDRY AND DAIRYING , be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has details regarding Indias share in global fish production and if so, the details thereof during the last three years; (b) the total fish production in the country during the last three years, year-wise; (c) the total number of brood banks constructed during the said period, State-wise; (d) the total number of hatcheries constructed in the same period, the details thereof, State-wise; (e) whether the Government has details regarding the average fish yield per unit cost and if so, a list of the same during the last three years, year-wise; and (f) if not, the reasons therefor?

Will the Minister of YOUTH AFFAIRS AND SPORTS be pleased to state: (a) the details of youth hostels currently functioning in the State of Maharashtra; and (b) whether the Government proposes to construct more youth hostels this financial year and if so, the details thereof?

topic: Removal of Communities for OBC List
contents: Will the Minister of SOCIAL JUSTICE AND EMPOWERMENT 55 be pleased to state: (a) whether the Ministry of Social Justice & Empowerment has received any requisition from Ministry of Tribal Affairs to delete the Parivara, Talawara and Siddi communities of Karnataka State from the OBC List; and (b) if so, the reason for the delay in removal of names of these three communities from the Central OBC List in spite of both the houses of parliament having passed the bill in 2020?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) the total area covered under Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana-Per Drop More Crop (PMKSY-PDMC) for micro irrigation in the country till date; (b) the progress made in the areas coming under micro irrigation during the last three years; (c) the amount of funds released to various States as central assistance under the scheme during said period; (d) the manner in which State Governments are working with the Central Government to promote these schemes; and (e) the strategy made by the Government for the utilisation of MIF and the details thereof?

from: ['Borlakunta, Shri Venkatesh Netha', 'Pasunoori, Shri Dayakar', 'Reddy, Dr. Gaddam Ranjith', 'Maloth, Smt. Kavitha']
contents: Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether it is true that 330 watershed development projects have been sanctioned for Telangana under PM Krish Sinchayee Yojana, if so, the details thereof; (b) whether it is true that more than 200 projects are pending for completion, if so, details thereof, district-wise; (c) the reasons for delay in completing the projects and efforts being made by the Ministry to complete the left out projects; and (d) the details of amount so far spent on the above projects, district-wise? .

topic: Setting -up of Fruits and Vegetable Processing Units
contents: Will the Minister of FOOD PROCESSING INDUSTRIES be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has implemented various schemes and is extending financial assistance for setting up of fruit and vegetable processing units in Haryana; (b) if so, the details thereof; and (c) the details of the fruit and vegetable processing units in Sirsa and Fatehabad district covered/benefited under these schemes during the last three years?

Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) the details of the budget provision for reconstruction and repair of roads under Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana (PMGSY) in the parliamentary constituency of Bhiwani-Mahendergarh from the year 2014-15 to 2021-22, year-wise; (b) the number of roads that have been built during the last five years upto November, 2021 under PMGSY in the parliamentary constituency of Bhiwani- Mahendergarh; and (c) the number of roads that have been renewed and repaired upto November, 2021 in the said place including the details of the road-wise development, division-wise?

Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government is aware that the migration problem among rural youth has increased continuously in the country; (b) if so, the details thereof and the reasons therefor; (c) whether the Government has prepared any action plan to prevent the migration of rural youth; and (d) if so, the details thereof?

contents: Will the Minister of INFORMATION AND BROADCASTING be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government proposes to phase out obsolete analog transmitters; (b) if so, the details thereof and the reason therefor; and (c) whether this move will provide for additional spectrum as a result of the phase out; and (d) if so, the details thereof?

contents: Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government is planning to expand organic farming in the country via any programme, scheme; (b) if so, the details thereof ; (c) the financial outlay for any such scheme for past three years; (d) whether there is any provision for training and capacity building of farmers; and (e) if so, the details of farmers trained /oriented State/UT-wise during the last three years?

Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) the status of having a National Register of Citizens (NRC) for the entire country; (b) the time by when the work related to NRC will be done along with the status of NRC in Assam; and (c) the time by which the Citizenship Amendment Act (CAA) will be finalised?

Will the Minister of PANCHAYATI RAJ be pleased to state: (a) the details of amount of funds allocated, sanctioned, released and spent for rural local bodies in the State of Telangana under 14th and 15th Finance Commission; and (b) the details of expenditure made and assets created with above funds in rural local bodies, with a particular reference to rural bodies in Vikarabad, Ranga Reddy districts of the State of Telangana?

topic: Restoration of Ancestral Property of Hindus in Kashmir
from: ['Majumdar, Dr. Sukanta', 'Sonkar, Shri Vinod Kumar', 'Naik, Shri Raja Amareshwara', 'Singh, Shri Bhola', 'Roy, Dr. Jayanta Kumar']
contents: Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has proposed to take measures to restore ancestral properties of Hindus who had to run away from Kashmir in the wake of rising terrorist violence in the valley; (b) if so, the details thereof; (c) whether the Government has appointed any authority to receive such request from Hindus, who returned to Kashmir to reclaim their movable and immovable properties; (d) if so, the details thereof including the number of such Hindus who have returned to Kashmir after the abrogation of Article 370; (e) the number of such cases where property has been restored to its rightful and original owner; and (f) the other measures taken by the Government in this regard so far?

topic: Expansion of Scope of PM-KISAN Scheme
contents: Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether the Ministry has plans to include landless agricultural labourers, sharecroppers and vulnerable agricultural households under the PM-Kisan Scheme; (b) if so, the details of the steps taken and if not, the reasons therefor; and (c) whether the Government is considering to increase the quantum of assistance under the said scheme, if so, the details about the increment including the expected date of its implementation and if not, the reasons therefor?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE 57 be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has put into place any annual surveys to measure farmers expenditure and farmers incomes in the country; (b) if so, details of the same including information on the current monthly farmer incomes on average in each State vis--vis their monthly expenditure; and (c) if not, the details of the methodology devised to monitor progress of the Governments commitment to double farmers incomes?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has increased Minimum Support Price (MSP) for designated rabi crops for the year 2021 or during the marketing/procurement season 2022-2023; (b) if so, the crop-wise details of the increase in the MSP thereof; (c) whether the Government has conducted any study for assessing the impact of MSP and the benefits likely to be availed by the farmers; and (d) if so, the details thereof and if not, the reasons therefor?

from: ['Patel, Shri Mitesh Rameshbhai', 'Patil, Shri Shriniwas Dadasaheb', 'Dhanorkar, Shri Balubhau Narayanrao (Alias Suresh)', 'K. Navas, Shri Kani']
