contents: Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) the number of Anti-Human Trafficking Units (AHTUs) established under the Advisory on preventing and combating human trafficking especially during the period of COVID-19 pandemic, State-wise; (b) the details of bi-annual crime reviews conducted by the Government to monitor the progress of AHTUs, State-wise and year-wise, from 2014 till date; and (c) whether it is a fact that bi-annual crime review meetings with State Nodal Officers have not been conducted since 2017, and if so, the reasons therefor?

from: ['Suresh, Shri Doddaalahalli Kempegowda', 'Ambareesh, Smt. Sumalatha', 'Kateel, Shri Nalin Kumar']
contents: Will the Minister of PANCHAYATI RAJ be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has taken note that there is a need to strengthen Gram Sabhas to seek opinions and consensus of people on significant issues, if so, the details thereof; (b) whether it is true that meetings of Gram Sabha marked by poor attendance and poor representation from the people; (c) if so, whether the Government proposes to take adequate measures to strengthen the functioning of gramsabhas; and (d) if so, the details of response of the Government in this regard?

Will the Minister of FOOD PROCESSING INDUSTRIES be pleased to state: (a) whether any steps are being taken to promote setting up of cold storages in order to minimise 58 post-harvest losses under food processing sector in the country and if so, the details thereof; (b) whether any budget has been allocated for the same and funds distributed so far; and (c) if so, the details of the funds distributed in Bihar, district-wise?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether despite various schemes under implementation for the promotion of agriculture in the country, 40 percent of farmers are still living below poverty line; (b) if so, whether the Government has undertaken a review of performance of each of these schemes during the last three years; (c) if so, the outcome of such a review; (d) whether the Government proposes to bring improvements in such schemes; and (e) if so, the details thereof?

from: ['Singh, Shri Ravneet', 'Ray, Prof. Sougata', 'Baij, Shri Deepak']
contents: Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has amended a 2014 notification and extended the jurisdiction of Border Security Force (BSF) in certain States including Punjab if so, the details thereof; (b) whether any consultation has been done with the States before extending the jurisdiction of the BSF in the international border areas adjacent to India; if so, the details and outcome thereof; (c) whether the experts have expressed apprehensions over possibility of increasing interference of the Centre in the Law and Order of the States and clashes between BSF and State Police Administration due to increasing the jurisdiction of BSF; (d) whether this decision of the Government has been opposed by some States. if so, the details thereof; and (e) whether the Government propose to look into the genuine concerns and objections raised by the State Governments and take corrective action in this regard; if so, the details thereof? .
party: ['Indian National Congress', 'All India Trinamool Congress', 'Indian National Congress']

from: ['Sagar, Shri Arun Kumar', 'Rawat, Shri Ashok Kumar']
contents: Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether agriculture activities are being done under Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (PKVY) in the country particularly in the Parliamentary Constituencies of Shahjahanpur and Misrikh in Uttar Pradesh; (b) if so, the status thereof as on date particularly in Shahjahanpur and Mishrikh Parliamentary Constituencies of Uttar Pradesh; and (c) the details of the central funds allocated during the last three years along with the utilization of the same and number of the beneficiaries, State-wise as on date?

Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) the quantum of funds allocated by the Union Government under the MNREGS during last three years year-wise and State-wise; (b) the number of the persons benefitted of the scheme in the country specially in the Ahmadnagar district and Shirdi parliamentary constituency of the State of Maharashtra; (c) whether the funds allocated under this scheme have been utilized timely; and (d) if so, the details thereof State-wise?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has any plan to introduce legal backing to the Minimum Support Price (MSP) to agricultural products; (b) if so, the details thereof; and (c) the steps taken by the Government on MSP?

Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS 59 be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has left out Tamil Nadu State from National Cyclone Risk Mitigation Projects (NCRMP) Phase-I & II which were implemented to respond better to cyclones and for the construction of infrastructure to address the vulnerability of coastal community to cyclones (b) if so, the details thereof and if not, the reasons therefor; (c) the effective measures taken by the Government to implement projects under NCRMP in Tamil Nadu; and (d) the details of the funds allocated for the projects under NCRMP?

from: ['Kateel, Shri Nalin Kumar', 'Murmu, Shri Khagen', 'Ambareesh, Smt. Sumalatha', 'Suresh, Shri Doddaalahalli Kempegowda', 'Jagathrakshakan, Shri S.']
contents: Will the Minister of COOPERATION be pleased to state: (a) the total number of cooperative functioning in the country at present, State-wise, district-wise; strengthen, and reform (b) whether the Government has taken note that cooperative sector is very old in Indian Society, if so, whether the Government has any vision/ objective/action plan/effective policy framework to the streamline cooperative societies and roots of cooperatives in the country, if so, the details thereof and if not, the reasons therefor; (c) the efforts made/being made by the Government to ensure that the cooperative movement reaches the grassroot level for facilitating the growth of a people based economic development model; and (d) whether the Government has set any target to achieve under the Cooperatives in the country, if so, the details thereof?
party: ['Bharatiya Janata Party', 'Bharatiya Janata Party', 'Independent', 'Indian National Congress', 'Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam']

contents: Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has any proposal to provide internet facility in all the jails of the country; (b) if so, whether the Government has taken any steps in this regard till date; and (c) if so, the details thereof and if not, the reasons therefor? .

from: ['Gupta, Shri Sangamlal Kadedin', 'Solanky, Shri Mahendra Singh', 'Ray, Smt. Sandhya', 'Chaudhary, Shri P.P.', 'Yadav, Dr. Krishnapal Singh']
contents: Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) the details of aims, objectives and features of Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY) 2.0; (b) whether the Government is taking steps to raise awareness about the scheme among beneficiaries; (c) if so, the details thereof; (d) the steps taken by the Government for grievance redressal mechanism under the scheme; and (e) the data of the beneficiaries under this scheme during the last three years and the current year, State- wise and district-wise including data for Madhya Pradesh, Rajasthan and Uttar Pradesh?
party: ['Bharatiya Janata Party', 'Bharatiya Janata Party', 'Bharatiya Janata Party', 'Bharatiya Janata Party', 'Bharatiya Janata Party']

topic: Inclusion of Ball Badminton Game in Arjun Awards
contents: Will the Minister of YOUTH AFFAIRS AND SPORTS be pleased to state: (a) whether the Ball Badminton game is not in the list for Arjun Award as it was in the list till 1984 and is now approved as school game also; (b) if so, whether this game has Global presence in countries like Malayasia, Singapore, Thailand, Nepal etc.; (c) if so, the details thereof; and (d) whether there is any proposal for the inclusion of above said game in the list for Arjun Awards, if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of YOUTH AFFAIRS AND SPORTS be pleased to state: (a) the details and the number of medals won in the Tokyo Paralympics by our Indian atheletes; (b) whether these atheletes are facing much barriers including stigma and discrimination; (c) if so, whether the Government extended any support to these atheletes and if so the details thereof; (d) whether any mechanism is available to oversee the strict implementation of any comprehensive 60 guidelines issued by the Indian Para sports body and if so, the details thereof; (e) whether any allegations of corruption was received against the Paralympic Committee of India recently; and (f) if so the details thereof and the reaction of the Government in this regard?

from: ['Sahu, Shri Chandra Sekhar', 'Bapat, Shri Girish Bhalchandra', 'Munde, Dr. Pritam Gopinath Rao', 'Shewale, Shri Rahul Ramesh']
contents: Will the Minister of SOCIAL JUSTICE AND EMPOWERMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has been granting scholarships to students of socially backward section of the society; (b)if so, whether children belonging to different castes studying in the same class get different amounts as scholarships, if so, the details thereof; (c) whether the Government proposes to rationalise all scholarships given to meritorious students belonging to Scheduled Castes, Scheduled Tribes, Other Backward Classes and minorities to award equal amount to students of the same class; and (d) if so, the details thereof and the time by when the final decision is likely to be taken in this regard?
party: ['Biju Janata Dal', 'Bharatiya Janata Party', 'Bharatiya Janata Party', 'Shiv Sena']

contents: Will the Minister of FISHERIES, ANIMAL HUSBANDRY AND DAIRYING , be pleased to state: (a) whether any cases relating to cruelty to animals are pending in the courts; (b) if so, the details thereof, State-wise as on date; (c) the total number of cases out of the total cases pending during the last five years; and (d) the details of the steps taken by the Government for the speedy disposal of the said cases?

Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: . (a) the total number of Indian Police Services (IPS) posts/cadres sanctioned/allotted by the Government for posting in various posts for the State of Maharashtra; (b) the total number of IPS cadre in various posts in the State of Maharashtra; and (c) the total number of IPS officers presently working in the Maharashtra State as on date, post-wise/cadre- wise?

topic: Disabled Persons Receiving Pension and Ex-gratia
contents: Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) the number of persons with disabilities who received the advance three month pension and ex-gratia relief of Rs 1000 since March 2020; (b) the details of beneficiaries who are currently covered under the Indira Gandhi National Disability Pension scheme; and (c) the criteria for providing pension under IGNDPS alongwith the reasons for the exclusionary criteria of providing pension to only people with 80 percent disabilities?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether Kadiyam in East Godavari district of Andhra Pradesh is one of the leading horticulture hubs of the country; (b) if so, the assistance provided by the Ministry for helping such hubs to increase production, mechanization, marketing infrastructure, export, etc., under Mission for Integrated Development of Horticulture (MIDH); (c) the details of financial and other assistance given to Kadiyam during the last three years, year-wise; (d) the activities taken up by Floricultural Research Directorate, Pune and Regional Research Centre at Kadiyam in Andhra Pradesh, particularly in Kadiyam, on floriculture?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE 61 be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has any plan to set up a Seed Research Centre in Kodad, Telangana; (b) if so, the details thereof and if not, the reasons therefor; (c) the timeline for establishing and starting operations of the Seed Research Centre in Kodad; and (d) the funds to be allocated to set up and operate the Seed Research Centre in Kodad?

topic: Implementation of National Rural Livelihood Mission
contents: Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) the salient features of the National Rural Livelihood Mission; (b) the details of the funds sanctioned, allocated and utilized under this scheme within Assam so far; (c) the details of the target set and achievements made so far within Assam so far along with its response; (d) whether the Government is planning to train Self-Help Groups (SHG) to contain spread of virus and uptake of COVID-19 vaccination among rural population within the country, if so, the details thereof; (e) whether the Government has set up SAKSHAM Centres under this mission within the country; and (f) if so, the number of centres set up in Assam, district wise along with its response?

Will the Minister of YOUTH AFFAIRS AND SPORTS be pleased to state: (a) the details of budgetary allocation for sports in ascending order during the last ten years from 2010-11 to 2020-21; (b) the break up of the budget allotted to each sport under various heads for the years 2019-20 and 2020-21; and (c) the medals won in each sport in the year of 2020 Olympics as compared to the budget allocated to it?

Will the Minister of FOOD PROCESSING INDUSTRIES be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has any plans to support the Food Processing Industries(FPIs) that are under great distress due to COVID-19; (b) if so, the details thereof, State-wise; (c) whether the Government has any plans to give any institutional support to start Food Processing Industries in the backdrop of COVID-19, if so, the details thereof, State-wise; (d) whether the Government has issued any directives to the district authorities to support Food Processing Industries that are struggling due to COVID-19; (e) if so, the details thereof, State-wise; and (f) if not, the reasons therefor?

topic: Fishers Opinion on Indian Marine Fisheries (IMF) Bill
contents: Will the Minister of FISHERIES, ANIMAL HUSBANDRY AND DAIRYING , be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has held any stakeholder consultation with regard to the Indian Marine Fisheries (IMF) Bill, 2021, if so, the details thereof; (b) whether the Government has translated the said Bill to any of the regional languages and circulated the same to solicit the opinion of traditional fishers on the Bill, if not, the reasons therefor; and (c) whether it is true that the said Bill is fundamentally against the interests of the traditional marine capture fishers, fish workers, and fisherwomen in the country?

topic: Schemes and Facilities for Persons with Disabilities
contents: Will the Minister of SOCIAL JUSTICE AND EMPOWERMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government proposer to start trainy and sensitization regarding Central sector schemes and facilities for Persons with Disabilities (PwD); (b) if so, the details thereof; (c) whether ASHA workers and Anganwadi workers would also be a part of the said programme, if so, the details thereof; (d) whether the training modules drafted in simple language would be translated into all regional languages, if so, the details thereof; and (e) whether the Government shall adopt any mechanism to improve the schemes related to Persons with Disabilities that shall be brought up by the trainees during the training period, if so, the details thereof? 62

Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government can provide the data for suicides due to drug abuse for the last three years and if so, the details thereof, especially for the State of Andhra Pradesh; (b) whether the Government is aware of the increasing suicides due to drug abuse and alcoholism at the national level and if so, the actions/steps taken/ being taken by the Government to control the situation thereof; (c) whether the Government recognizes the problem of drug addiction and abuse among the youth of the country and if so, action taken thereof; (d) the awareness measures that have been undertaken by the Narcotics Control Bureau to curb substance abuse among teens and youth; and (e) whether the Government can provide data on the quantity of drug confiscated during the last three years and if so, the details thereof, drug category-wise?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has conducted any study/research on the impact of Shifting/Jhum Cultivation on pollution and CO2 Emissions, if so, the details thereof; (b) the steps taken by the Government to incentivise farmers to switch away from Slash and Burn; and (c) whether the incentives/subsidies offered will cover the entire cost of adopting alternative technologies/ practices, if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of FISHERIES, ANIMAL HUSBANDRY AND DAIRYING , be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government proposes to give special focus on entrepreneurship development in rural poultry, sheep and goat rearing and breed improvement including fodder and fodder development scheme; (b) if so, the details thereof; (c) the details of estimated amount of fund allotted under this along with the estimated target; and (d) the time by which it is likely to be implemented? .

Will the Minister of FISHERIES, ANIMAL HUSBANDRY AND DAIRYING , be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has taken any steps towards genetic improvement and preservation of Siri Cow breed, cattle breed of hilly region of the States of West Bengal and Sikkim; (b) whether the Government provides loan at lower rates of interest or without interest to promote dairy and animal husbandry; (c) if so, the details thereof including the criteria fixed for availing financial assistance;and (d) the details of steps taken by the Government to increase credit flow the promotion of dairy and animal husbandry?

Will the Minister of HEAVY INDUSTRIES be pleased to state: (a) whether manufacturing of automobiles has been reduced and the automobiles sales has also declined due to the spread of COVID-19 virus in the country; (b) if so, the details thereof; and (c) the measures being taken by the Government to tackle this situation?

Will the Minister of YOUTH AFFAIRS AND SPORTS be pleased to state: (a) whether the sports persons from North East excelling at international levels over the post few years, if so, the details thereof; (b) whether funds allocated for the Target Olympic Podium (TOP) scheme is sufficient and if so, the details thereof along with the progress of the scheme; (c) if not, the manner in which the Government will generate fund for the above mentioned scheme and overall sports development; (d) whether Karate has been included in Olympics Game and if so, the other steps taken by the Government to develop Karate; and (e) whether the Government would consider establishing a State-of-the-art sports training facility in Barpeta Lok Sabha Constituency of Assam and if so, the details thereof? 63

topic: Celebration of Azadi Ka Amrit Mahotsava
contents: Will the Minister of INFORMATION AND BROADCASTING be pleased to state: (a) the details of programmes organized by the Government in pursuit of celebration of Azadi Ka Amrit Mahotsava; and (b) the details of the programmes proposed to be organized during the course of celebration of Azadi Ka Amrit Mahotsav in the days ahead?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether the pandemic has exposed both the strengths and the vulnerabilities of Indias agri food systems, and has also emphasized the need for agricultural market reforms and digital solutions to connect farmers to markets, create safety nets, ensure reasonable working conditions, and decentralize the agri food systems to make them more resilient; and (b) if so, the details of the steps taken by the Government in this regard, and if not, the reasons therefor?

topic: Departmental Standing Committee at  Village/Block Level
contents: Will the Minister of PANCHAYATI RAJ be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government proposes to constitute the departmental Standing Committee/Advisory Committee at the village level in all the panchayats of the country, if so, the details thereof; (b) whether the Government proposes to constitute the departmental Standing Committee/Advisory Committee at block level across the country; (c) if so, the details thereof; and (d) whether the Government in coordination with the State Government of Haryana proposes to constitute the departmental Standing Committee/Advisory Committee, if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether as many as 21 of 35 States/UTs have utilised over 100 per cent of their allocated funds under the Mahatma Gandhi Rural Employment Guarantee Scheme (MGNREGS) for financial year 2021-22 by October 29, 2021, if so, the details thereof, State-wise; and (b) whether the allocations for MGNREGS were increased to meet the demand for work, with the Revised Estimates for spending for the scheme as MGNREGS was a life-saver for the poor, especially migrant labourers, following the sudden lockdown announced by the Union Government; and (c) if so, the details thereof and the present status thereof, State-wise?

from: ['Bellana, Shri Chandra Sekhar', 'Reddy, Shri Magunta Sreenivasulu', 'Reddy, Shri P.V. Midhun', 'Patil, Shri Sanjay(Kaka) Ramchandra', 'Rangaiah, Shri Talari', 'Madhav, Shri Kuruva Gorantla', 'Reddy, Shri Adala Prabhakara']
contents: Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government is taking any steps to push the agenda of Gender Mainstreaming in Agriculture by way of allocating funds for women under various schemes/programmes; (b) if so, the details thereof; (c) whether the Farmer Producer Organisations (FPOs) are able to empower the women farmers; and (d) if so, the details thereof?
party: ['Yuvajana Sramika Rythu Congress Party', 'Yuvajana Sramika Rythu Congress Party', 'Yuvajana Sramika Rythu Congress Party', 'Bharatiya Janata Party', 'Yuvajana Sramika Rythu Congress Party', 'Yuvajana Sramika Rythu Congress Party', 'Yuvajana Sramika Rythu Congress Party']
state: ['Andhra Pradesh', 'Andhra Pradesh', 'Andhra Pradesh', 'Maharashtra', 'Andhra Pradesh', 'Andhra Pradesh', 'Andhra Pradesh']

topic: Schemes for Animal Husbandry and Dairying
contents: Will the Minister of FISHERIES, ANIMAL HUSBANDRY AND DAIRYING , be pleased to state: (a) the names of Central Schemes implemented for Animal Husbandry and Dairying particularly in backward and rural areas during the last three years as on date, State-wise; (b) the amount of funds provided by the Government separately for these schemes each year during the said period; (c) whether any new technology has been developed in these sectors by the Indian Council of Agricultural Research or any other such research institute; (d) if so, the details thereof; and 64 (e) the efforts being made by the Government to check the consistent decline in the number of various animals?

topic: Setting-up of Food Processing Industry Parks in Bihar
contents: Will the Minister of FOOD PROCESSING INDUSTRIES be pleased to state: (a) the details of the food processing industry parks being set up in Bihar and its current status location- wise; and (b) the role being played by the Government in the development of food processing industry parks being set up in Bihar?

Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) the details of the proposals sanctioned and amount allocated in Rajasthan under the third phase of Pradhan Mantri Sadak Yojana, district-wise; (b) the present status of the proposal sanctioned under this yojana; (c) the present status of the proposals sanctioned for Gujarat; and (d) whether any scheme is being formulated to inter- connect villages through a ring road in the third phase of Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana, if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of HEAVY INDUSTRIES be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has considered taking action against the foreign automobile Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEMs) that have exited India without giving prior notice to customers and dealers, if so, the details thereof; (b) if not, whether the Government intends to take any action towards minimizing foreign automobile OEM exits or enabling smooth exits with minimal financial exposure for automobile dealers, employees and customers; (c) whether the Government has devised a plan to protect automobile dealers from unfair treatment by . foreign automobile OEMs in execution of the dealership agreements; and (d) if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government regularly conducts Zonal Council Meetings; (b) if so, the details thereof; (c) whether the Southern Zonal Council met recently; (d) if so, the list of Chief Ministers or representatives of States who attended this meeting and all the previous meetings held during the last three years; (e) whether the Government keeps the record of Chief Ministers who have not attended the Southern Zonal Council Meetings; and (f) if so, the details thereof during the aforesaid period?

topic: National Crop Forecast Centre for Yield Estimation
contents: Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) the details of the pilot projects undertaken under the Mahalanobis National Crop Forecast Centre to develop yield estimation at Gram Panchayat level and the status of projects thereof; (b) whether the Government aims to undertake any scheme to assess accurate crop yield/loss at insurance unit for quick claims under Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana; (c) if so, the details thereof; (d) whether any data has been collected after the approval of the DGCA for flying of drone to collect the data in the 100 pilot districts for paddy and wheat crops; and (e) if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of FISHERIES, ANIMAL HUSBANDRY AND DAIRYING , be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has noticed that a large number of fishermen were attacked by armed forces of neighbouring countries; 65 (b) if so, the steps taken to protect the lives of our fishermen; and (c) the details of such attacks by Pakistan and Sri Lanka during the last three years?

topic: Payment of Wages to MGNREGS Workers
contents: Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether there have been delays in the payment of wages to workers under Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Scheme (MGNREGS), if so, the details thereof State-wise and district-wise particularly in Uttar Pradesh; (b) the reasons for the delay in payments to MGNREGS workers in various States; (c) the details of wage payments that are pending approval from the Central Government across the country, for work done between April and October; (d) the details of wage payments that are pending in the State of Tamil Nadu for work done between April and October; (e) whether the Government has taken measures to expedite the approval of wage payments to MGNREGS workers and ensured that the previous payments are distributed; and (e) if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) the details of assets that have been created under the MGNREGS scheme in Uttar Pradesh (b) whether the Government evaluates the value generated from those assets; (c) if so, the details thereof; and (d) whether the quality of assets created under the scheme are monitored and evaluated and if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) whether the Delhi Police has received any representation or complaint from Supreme Court Registrar . Office in relation to impersonating voices of judges, if so, the details thereof; (b) whether any First Information Report (FIR) or complaint has been registered in Tilak Marg Police Station in relating to impersonating voices of judges; and (c) if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government is contemplating the DNA survey of children begging on streets so as to take steps to reunite trafficked children with their biological parents; (b) if so, the details thereof; (c) whether the Government is considering to create a pan India database of DNA information for trafficked children and their biological parents; and (d) if so, the details thereof and if not, the reasons therefor?

Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has taken note that the younger generation are more vulnerable to cyber crimes; (b) if so, the details thereof and the reasons therefor; (c) whether the Government has any plan to include cyber crime awareness as part of curriculum of the students apart from making stringent laws to control the crime; and` (d) if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) the percentage of farmers deprived of facilities like bank account in the country and the details thereof; (b) the manner in which farmers are benefitted from Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi Yojana (PM-KISAN); (c) whether the Government propose to increase the amount provided under the scheme keeping in view the 66 interest of farmers, corona pandemic and current inflation condition; (d) if so, the details of the increased amount and the time by which it is proposed to be increased; and (e) the number of farmers benefitted from this scheme in Bijnour Constituency and the details thereof?

topic: Villages Covered under National Rural  Livelihood Mission
contents: Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) the number of villages covered by the National Rural Livelihood Mission, State-wise along with Rajasthans district and block distribution; (b) the number of Self Help Groups (SHGs) registered in the national network; (c) whether the Government is planning to introduce technical and managerial training for women to run businesses digitally; (d) whether the Government has improved the market linkages of SHGs over the past year, alongwith the future action plans for the same; and (e) whether the Government has any data to boost SHGs in rural economies across States, if so, the details thereof, State-wise and district-wise particularly Rajasthan?

topic: Promotion of Rural and Indigenous/Tribal Games
contents: Will the Minister of YOUTH AFFAIRS AND SPORTS be pleased to state: (a) the games identified under the promotion of rural and indigenous/tribal games component of Khelo India; (b) the details and the number of annual national competitions/activities/demonstrations held for rural and indigenous/tribal games since 2018 and the games for which competitions have been held; (c) the number of NGOs and sports federations/ associations to whom financial support has been provided for promotion of these games since 2018 and the amount given, State-wise; and (d) the number of top sports persons identified for these games, State-wise?

Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS . be pleased to state: (a) whether there is any guideline for determining the threat to national security; (b) if so, the details thereof and the basis and criteria used to determine that a person, institution, or a group of persons are a threat to national security; and (c) if not, the reasons, therefor?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has allocated funds to encourage education in agricultural universities located in Punjab to further boost the agriculture sector; (b) if so, the details thereof; (c) whether the Government is contemplating setting up a new agricultural university in Punjab to give a further boost to agricultural education; and (d) if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of SOCIAL JUSTICE AND EMPOWERMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether it has come to the notice of the Government that Caste based discrimination is still prevalent in the country, if so, the details thereof; (b) the steps taken by the Government to eradicate caste discrimination in the country; and (c) the total crimes on caste discrimination reported during the last two years?

Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has launched a comprehensive employment-cum-rural pulic works campaign named Garib Kalyan Rojgar Abhiyaan (GKRA) to empower and provide livelihood opportunities in areas/villages witnessing large number of returnee migrant workers affected by devastating COVID-19; (b) if so, the details thereof along with the number of beneficiaries, mandays employment generated and the 67 expenditure incurred under the said scheme till date, State-wise; (c) whether the said scheme has been successful; and (d) if so, the details thereof along with the steps being taken to ensure effective and timely implementation of the said scheme?

topic: Payment of Insurance Claims under PMFBY
contents: Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether insurance claims are being paid to farmers on time after crop damage/failure under the Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY), if so, the details thereof; (b) whether in many States, including Odisha, the payment of insurance claims for crop failure in 2018-19, 2019-20 and 2020-21 is still pending, if so the details thereof; (c) whether the Government proposes to take steps for payment of all these outstanding claims; (d) if so, the details thereof and the time by which the outstanding claims will be fully paid and if not, the reasons therefor; and (e) the steps being taken by the Government to ensure that farmers are being compensated properly especially during crop loss in cases of drought or deficient rainfall?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government is aware that the installment of crop insurance compensation for the year 2020-21 has not been paid to the farmers in Nanded till date; (b) if so, the reasons therefor; (c) whether the officials working in the concerned department are not serious in this regard; and (d) the time by which the insured compensation amount is likely to be paid to the farmers?

topic: Deen Dayal Upadhyay Grameen Kaushal Yojana
contents: Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) the details and salient features of Deen Dayal Upadhyay Grameen Kaushal Yojana (DDU-GKY) to promote rural employment through skill development including the details of the budgetary allocation made during each of the last three years and the current year along with the progress of the scheme, State/UT-wise; (b) the number of training centres in Jharkhand and the number of people trained, assessed, certified and placed through these centres, district-wise; (c) whether the Government proposes to lift the cap of 25 per cent on the permissible limit of expenditure under the DDU-GKY, if so, the details thereof and the reasons therefor; (d) the number of rural youth benefitted through this scheme since its inception, State/UT-wise; (e) whether all the villages have been covered in this scheme, if so, the details thereof including the reasons therefor, State/UT-wise; and (f) whether any plan has been devised for the revival of Rural Skill Development Programme by including more rural youth under the scheme to give fillip to Make in India programme?

Will the Minister of YOUTH AFFAIRS AND SPORTS be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has taken any measures to improve youth volunteerism in Karnataka and engage youth in community and skill development projects, if so, the details thereof; (b) whether the Government aims to expand the reach of National Cadet Corps (NCC) as well as Bharat Scouts and Guides programme, and mobilise their efforts in assisting and monitoring ground-level issues of stubble burning, cleanliness and more, if so, the details thereof; and (c) whether the Government has taken any measures to increase the effectiveness of the NCC in the current semester-based education system with mandatory attendance which makes NCC participation less plausible, and if so, the details thereof?

topic: Promotion of Fisheries and Animal Husbandry
contents: Will the Minister of FISHERIES, ANIMAL HUSBANDRY AND DAIRYING , be pleased to state: 68 (a) the details of the programmes/schemes currently being implemented by the department for the promotion of fisheries and animal husbandry and for its proper development; (b) the details of the schemes currently being implemented in Darbhanga district of the State of Bihar, scheme-wise; (c) whether the Government proposes to set up a training institute in Darbhanga for proper training in fisheries and animal husbandry; and (d) if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of PANCHAYATI RAJ be pleased to state: (a) whether the scheme to connect village Panchayats with broadband/internet is being implemented under Digital India Programme; (b) if so, the details thereof; (c) the number of village Panchayats connected with broadband/internet including those located in the State of Chhattisgarh as on date; (d) the parameters/criteria being adhered to connect village Panchayats with broadband/internet; and (e) the time by which the work of connecting village Panchayats with broadband/internet is likely to be completed?

topic: Management and Regulation of Cooperative Societies
contents: Will the Minister of COOPERATION be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government is planning to revisit the management and regulation of cooperative societies; (b) if so, the details thereof; and (c) if not, the reasons therefor?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has any mechanism to assess the quality of services offered by Krishi Vigyan Kendra (KVKs); (b) if so, the details thereof; (c) whether the Government provides financial assistance to the KVKs; and . (d) if so, the details thereof?

from: ['Pasunoori, Shri Dayakar', 'Borlakunta, Shri Venkatesh Netha', 'Maloth, Smt. Kavitha', 'Reddy, Dr. Gaddam Ranjith']
contents: Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether the Ministry is aware that there are only 16 Krishi Vigyan Kendras in Telangana when there are 31 districts in the State; (b) if so, whether the Ministry will consider opening more KVKs in districts where there are no KVKs in Telangana; (c) whether any impact assessment of KVKs has been done and, if so, the findings of such assessment; (d) whether each KVK has to cater to 90-100 villages which the KVK is finding difficult; (e) if so, whether the Ministry will consider establishing additional KVKs in the country; and (f) if so, the details thereof and if not, the reasons therefor?
party: ['Telangana Rashtra Samithi', 'Telangana Rashtra Samithi', 'Telangana Rashtra Samithi', 'Telangana Rashtra Samithi']

contents: Will the Minister of FISHERIES, ANIMAL HUSBANDRY AND DAIRYING , be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has any proposal to give cash dole of Rs. 10,000/- Rs. to fishermen during the time of fishing ban, if so, the details thereof; (b) whether the Government has any plan to hike the diesel / kerosene subsidy to fishermen, if so, the details thereof; (c) the details of measures taken so far to give good level of higher education to the children of fishermen; and (d) the details of schemes being implemented/likely to be implemented for eradication of middleman in fish trade?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: 69 (a) the total quantity of onions produced in the country during the last three years and the current year; (b) whether the Government has any proposal to ban export of onions permanently since the demand is higher than supply in the country, if so, the details thereof; (c) whether the amendment to the Essential Commodities Act, 1955 by imposing stock limit will affect onion farmers; and (d) if so, the steps being taken by the Government to augment the income of the farmers who can stock their produce to get better price in future?

Will the Minister of SOCIAL JUSTICE AND EMPOWERMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has carried out any study on the implications of various national level entrance examinations such as NEET etc. on policy and programs of Government towards ensuring social justice by way of reservation in education and jobs; (b) if so, the details thereof and if not, the reasons therefor; and (c) the remedial measures taken by the Government to ensure that socially and educationally backward class people are not deprived of their Constitutional rights in education and job opportunities because of National level examinations like NEET?

topic: Impact of COVID-19 on Rural Development
contents: Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has assessed the impact of COVID -19 on the rural development sector in general, and on the income of rural people, in particular; (b) if so, the details thereof; and (c) the efforts undertaken by the Government for providing livelihood opportunities to the rural people during COVID -19 ?

Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether the Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Scheme (MGNREGS) is facing a negative net balance, if so, the details thereof; . (b) the details of the pending liabilities till date as part of the MGNREGS, with separate lists of the wage and material components, State-wise; (c) the number of person-days of work demanded and number of person-days of work generated in 2019- 20 and thus far in 2020-21; (d) whether the Government has instructed that wage payments under MGNREGS be split according to caste categories; and (e) if so, the details thereof and the reasons therefor along with the reasons for retracting such order?

topic: Rules and Regulations for OTT Platforms
contents: Will the Minister of INFORMATION AND BROADCASTING be pleased to state: (a) whether the existing rules and regulations do not prevent the transmission of objectionable content broadcast by Over-the-Top (OTT) platforms, if so, the details thereof; (b) whether the rich cultural traditions and beliefs of the country are being harmed by these contents, if so, the details thereof; (c) whether the contents available on such platforms can have negative impact on the mindset of the adolescents, if so the details thereof; (d) whether OTT platforms now come under the purview of the Government as per the notification issued earlier by the Government and if so, the details thereof; and (e) whether the Government has any specific legislation that regulates OTT platforms to ensure that peoples sentiments are taken care of, if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of FISHERIES, ANIMAL HUSBANDRY AND DAIRYING , be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government is aware of the shortage of dry fodder, green fodder and concentrate feed for the Indian livestock; (b) if so, the details thereof including shortage and the adverse impact on the dairy product may be provided; (c) whether the Government has any plan to bridge the shortage gap in a time-bound period; and (d) if so, the details thereof? 70

topic: Setting up of New FM and Community Radio Stations
contents: Will the Minister of INFORMATION AND BROADCASTING be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has any policy relating to FM stations and Community Radio stations in each district in the country, if so, the details thereof; (b) whether the Government has any proposal to start an FM and Community Radio station in Kasaragod (Kerala) district if the land is made available/allocated and if so, the details thereof; (c) the details of the kilowatts capacity of the Kannur FM and Community station; (d) whether there is any proposal to increase the kilowatts capacity, if so, the details thereof; (e) whether the Government is preparing any auction for FM station under the private sector and if so, the details thereof; (f) the criteria for a private party to set up a new FM and Community Radio station; and (g) whether there is any proposal/intent from any private players to start an FM and Community Radio station in the Kasaragod district and if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has implemented Agricultural Marketing Infrastructure scheme under which assistance has been provided for construction and renovation of godowns, etc. in rural areas of all States including Bihar to enhance the storage capacity for agriculture products; (b) if so, the details thereof and if not, the reasons therefor; (c) the details of the action taken by the Government during the last three years for creating more storage facilities in Bihar particularly in the district of Gopalganj; (d) whether the Government has proposed to construct sufficient storage facilities in Bihar including in Gopalganj district considering the demands of farmers; and (d) if so, the details thereof?

from: ['Singh, Shri Uday Pratap', 'Singh, Shri Nayab', 'Katheria, Prof. (Dr.) Ram Shankar']
contents: Will the Minister of FISHERIES, ANIMAL HUSBANDRY AND DAIRYING , be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has formulated/proposed to formulate any scheme to double the production of fish and income of fishermen, including the States of Madhya Pradesh and Uttar Pradesh; (b) if so, the details thereof; (c) the details of the steps taken under Atamnirbhar Bharat Mission to provide training and financial assistance for fisheries to the fishermen during current and last three years, State/UT-wise; and (d) the details of the funds issued for promotion of fisheries in the States of Madhya Pradesh and Uttar Pradesh during each of the last three years?
party: ['Bharatiya Janata Party', 'Bharatiya Janata Party', 'Bharatiya Janata Party']

contents: Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) whether it is a fact that the atrocitis against Dalits have increased in the country particularly in the State of Telangana and Uttar Pradesh; (b) if so, the number of cases of violence against Dalits reported in the country during the last three years and recent year along with the details thereof, region- wise and district-wise; (c) whether the Government has issued any instructions to stop the atrocities against the Dalits in the country; especially in Uttar Pradesh; and (d) if so, the details thereof; and (e) if not, the reasons therefor?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government provides subsidy to small and marginal farmers to set up drip and sprinkler irrigation system under Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana-Per Drop More Crop (PMKSY-PDMC); (b) if so, the percentage of subsidy provided to farmers along with the details thereof; (c) the efforts made by the Government to cover economic sectors coming under micro irrigation and to promote them; 71 (d) the benefits of drip and sprinkler irrigation system set up under PDMC; and (e) the progress made in this scheme so far along with the details thereof?

Will the Minister of SOCIAL JUSTICE AND EMPOWERMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether Government has set up / proposes to set up Divyang Khel Kendra across the country, if so, the details thereof; (b) whether Government has also proposed to establish National Sports Centres for specially abled persons in the country including Rajasthan, if so, the details thereof of the places identified, fund allocated and the time by which these will be established; (c) the other steps being taken by the Government to empower Divyangs in the country; and (d) the steps taken by the Government to provide an advance sports infrastructure to ensure effective participation of Persons with Disabilities in sports activities?

Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government proposes to expedite the development of roads under Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana(PMGSY), if so, the details of action taken thereon; (b) the details of sanction given for roads in Kollam Lok Sabha constituency under PMGSY; (c) the details regarding delay in execution of development of roads under PMGSY; (d) whether the Government consider the recommendation of State Government for the selection of roads under PMGSY, if so, the details thereof; (e) whether the Government proposes to give sanction to Kuzhiyam - Thalayathu- Thannivila Mevar Elavila Moolapana Alamkode Temple Anapuzhakkal road of Chadayamangalam block in Kollam District; (f) if so, the details of action taken thereon, if not, the reasons therefor; and (g) whether the Government proposes to implement the works as per the recommendations of the State Government considering the rain and other geographical peculiarities of State, if so, the details thereof? .

Will the Minister of INFORMATION AND BROADCASTING be pleased to state: (a) the details and the number of Community Radio Services in the country; (b) whether there is any proposal to expand it further; and (c) if so, the details thereof?

topic: Difference between Market Price and MSP
contents: Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether the Ministry is aware that the market prices for October 2021 are below the MSP for eight major crops, including groundnut, bajra, jowar, maize, tur, arhar, moong, and paddy in Bihar including district Bhagalpur; (b) if so, the reasons therefor; (c) whether the National Agricultural Cooperative Marketing Federation of India (NAFED) was not able to procure adequate quantities of pulses in the kharif and rabi season; (d) if so, the reasons therefor; (e) whether any remedial measures have been taken to address this issue; and (f) if so, the details thereof and if not, the reasons therefor?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) the details of the schemes being implemented by the Government to identify under comprehensive possibilities in agriculture in other States including in the State of Haryana; (b) the quantum of funds allocated for these schemes during the last eight years; (c) whether the funds was utilised during the fixed time frame; and (d) if so, the details thereof? 72

Will the Minister of INFORMATION AND BROADCASTING be pleased to state: (a) whether the Prasar Bharati has recently entered into a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with IIT Kanpur to develop Next Generation Broadcast solution/ roadmap for Digital Terrestrial Broadcasting; (b) if so, the details thereof; (c) whether any emerging technologies like 5G Broadcast will enable new applications such as Direct to Mobile Broadcasting to create new content opportunities through the use of Artificial Intelligence Algorithms; and (d) if so, the manner in which the Government is planning to utilize these technologies alongwith the details thereof?

Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) whether there has been an increase in the incidents of custodial violence/death in the country; (b) if so, the steps being taken by the Government on this issue; (c) the number of custodial deaths in the country during the last three years, State/UT-wise; (d) the number of cases of custodial deaths where the National Human Rights Commission (NHRC) recommended paying compensation during the above- mentioned period, State/UT-wise; (e) the data depicting the number of prison violence that took place along with the number of deaths due to the same; and (f) the steps taken by the Government in this regard?

topic: Setting up of FM Transmitters in SSB
contents: Will the Minister of INFORMATION AND BROADCASTING be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has initiated the setting- up of approved Frequency Modulation (FM) transmitters in Sashastra Seema Bal (SSB) premises at seven locations along the Indo-Nepal Border including West Champaran in the State of Bihar; (b) if so, the details thereof; . (c) the details and the total quantum of funds sanctioned by the Government for the same; and (d) the time by which the setting up of the FM transmitters will be completed?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) the names of schemes being run by the Government for agriculture in North-Eastern States; (b) the amount of funds allocated for these schemes during the last eight years; (c) whether the above-mentioned funds have been utilized in the fixed time limit; and (d) if so, the details thereof?

from: ['Patel, Shri Parbatbhai Savabhai', 'Kachhadiya, Shri Naranbhai Bhikhabhai']
contents: Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether any effort is being made by the Government to increase the income of farmers while giving priority to agricultural export; (b) if so, the details thereof and whether it is also being considered that our agricultural produce should be chemical-free; (c) if so, the details thereof; and (d) whether the Government is considering to export agricultural produce from Gujarat in large quantities and if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) whether any steps have been taken/proposed to be taken by the Government to carve out a separate Vidarbha State out of the State of Maharashtra; (b) if so, the details thereof; and (c) if not, the reasons therefor? 73

Will the Minister of FISHERIES, ANIMAL HUSBANDRY AND DAIRYING , be pleased to state: (a) the total number of livestock present in the country and whether the livestock sector is increasing in the country, State-wise; (b) whether the Government has plan of action to build new veterinary hospitals and clinics, if so, the details thereof; (c) whether the Government maintains any data of total number of animals vaccinated every year, if so, details thereof and whether the Government has sufficient stock of vaccines for animals; (d) whether the Government has any mechanism to provide nutritional fodder to the animals in the country, in view of the fact that hardly 5% of land is utilised to grow fodder in India, if so, the details thereof; and (e) whether the Government has taken any steps/ measures to promote dairy and livestock industry in the country, if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government proposes to rollback the decision of extension of the jurisdiction of BSF from 15Km to 50 Km in the State of West Bengal, Punjab and Assam, if so, the details thereof; (b) whether the Government has consulted State Government on the above said issue; (c) the steps taken by Government to empower the State Police and intelligence in Border districts to check trans border criminals; (d) whether the Government has assessed that enhancing the jurisdiction in densely populated border area will avert BSFs attention from core responsibility; and (e) if so, the details thereof?

topic: Promotion of Sports and Sportsperson in North East
contents: Will the Minister of YOUTH AFFAIRS AND SPORTS be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has taken special initiatives to promote sports and encourage North East sportspersons in North East; and (b) if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) the detailed programmes/schemes for development of coconut cultivation/ production in the country; (b) the annual production of coconut in the country as on 31st October, 2021, State-wise; (c) the initiatives of the Coconut Development Board (CDB) for promoting value added products from raw coconut across the country and the details thereof; and (d) the detailed programmes of the Government/ CDB for providing better marketing facilities to the coconut farmers?

topic: Construction of Roads under PMGSY in Odisha
contents: Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government is on track to achieve its goals in Odisha for construction of rural roads under the Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana (PMGSY) for this financial year, if so, the details thereof and if not, the reasons therefor; (b) the targets set out for the next financial year, and the details thereof; and (c) whether the Government is considering implementation of another phase of this scheme to link all the remaining economically backward/LWE affected areas in Odisha and the rest of the country to the core network, if so, the details thereof, if not, the reasons therefor?

Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has recently launched an initiative to create Lakhpati Self Help Group (SHG) women to enable rural SHG women to earn at least Rs 1 lakh per annum; (b) if so, the details thereof; (c) the number of blocks that have been covered under the National Rural Livelihood Mission till date 74 along with funds allocated and utilized under the said Mission, State/UT wise details thereof; and (d) the number of Self Help Group (SHG) formed along with number of women mobilized into such SHGs, State/UT wise details thereof?

topic: Impact of COVID-19 on Poultry and Dairy Sector
contents: Will the Minister of FISHERIES, ANIMAL HUSBANDRY AND DAIRYING , be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government is aware of the losses incurred by the poultry and dairy sector due to lockdown caused by COVID-19 pandemic? (b) if so, whether any assessment regarding such losses has been conducted? (c) if so, the details thereof? (d) whether any compensation for such losses is under consideration of the Government? and (e) if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government is considering to change the 60:40 ratio of Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Scheme (MGNREGS); and (b) if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has noticed that the central agencies have seized large quantity of drug (Heroin) in the State of Gujarat including Mundra Port in Gujarat; (b) if so, the details thereof including total quantum and the value of drugs in international market; (c) whether the Government has conducted any detailed enquiry into the matter; (d) if so, the details thereof including the details of the sender and receiver of the drugs; (e) whether the privatization of ports and airports has caused increase in large scale smuggling of drugs; and (f) if so, the details thereof? .

Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) the total number of cases of death in police custody reported in the country in 2021, State- wise; (b) whether the Government has any plan to introduce any special laws or provisions to reduce the incidences of custodial torture and death; (c) whether efforts have been made to sensitize the police officers on handling prisoners; and (d) if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government is aware about the effect of chemical and bio-fertilizers on agriculture; (b) if so, the details thereof; (c) whether the Government has any plan for opening of distribution/sale centres for organic/bio-fertilizers on the lines of the sales/distribution centres set up for chemical fertilizers; (d) if so, the details thereof; (e) whether the Government proposes to promote the use of vermicompost/decompost manure to promote bio-organic fertilizers; and (f) if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of FOOD PROCESSING INDUSTRIES be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government is providing grants to establish Micro Food Processing units in the country; (b) if so, the details thereof specially in Santhal Pargana of Jharkhand, and if not, the reasons therefor; (c) whether the Government has implemented any proposal for establishing Mini Food Parks to benefit small farmers; (d) if so, the details thereof and if not, the reasons therefor, State-wise especially in Jharkhand; and 75 (e) whether the Government has taken any steps pertaining to Food Processing Industries to benefit small and medium farmers and if so, the details thereof?

Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) whether Government is aware that the percentage by which the prisoners locked in Indian jails at present is more than their capacity; (b) the number of undertrial prisoners locked in jails for more than one year including the details thereof, State-wise; and (c) the reasons for increase in the number of undertrial prisoners in the jails?

topic: Works Undertaken under MGNREGS in Kerala
contents: Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether there has been any delay in payment of Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Emplyment Generation Scheme (MGNREGS) funds to States by the Central Government; (b) if so, the details thereof; (c) if not, the details of total amount of funds allocated to the State of Kerala for the financial year 2021-22 under MGNREGS; and (d) whether the Government maintains list of works undertaken under MGNREGS by the State and if so, the list of works being undertaken by Kerala State in financial year 2021-22 and total amount of money spent under MGNREGS by the State of Kerala for FY 2021-22?

topic: Assistance to Establish Cold Storage in Telangana
contents: Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has provided any assistance during the last three years to establish cold storage in order to protect fruits and vegetables from decaying in Telangana; and (b) if so, the details thereof, year-wise? .

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether any scheme is being implemented by the Government to promote timber producing trees on farmers land; (b) if so, the details of the States and regions that are being selected under this scheme along with the details of the norms for the selection; and (c) the manner in which the assistance will be provided to the farmers along with the details of regions that will be covered under the said scheme?

Will the Minister of COOPERATION be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government is aware of increasing instances of scams and large scale misappropriation and false loans raised in the name of unsuspecting subscribers of cooperative banks in the country that is causing systematic collapse of cooperative sector in the country; and (b) if so, whether the Government has sought report from the Government of Kerala in matters concerning swindling of funds, embezzlement and forged loans in Karuvannoor Cooperative Bank , Thrissur district of Kerala State; and , if so, the details thereof; (c) whether the Government is implementing a uniform policy directive of conducting and transacting business in cooperative banks in the country through the Ministry of Cooperation; and, (d) if so, the details thereof and action taken in this regard?

Will the Minister of SOCIAL JUSTICE AND EMPOWERMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government is aware that the senior citizens belonging to the Economically Weaker Sections (EWS) in the country, especially in Bihar are not getting the benefits of social security schemes due to irregularities in the system; and 76 (b) if so, the action being taken by the Government in this regard?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether it is true that India has not signed for the Sustainable Agriculture Policy Action agenda at COP26, if so, the details thereof; (b) whether the National Mission for Sustainable Agriculture (NMSA) under the National Action Plan for Climate Change is in line with the COP26 agenda; (c) if so, the details thereof; and (d) the action taken by the Government during 2020 and 2021 under the NMSA and the funds allocated therein?

topic: Impact of Climate Change on Agriculture
contents: Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether any study/research has been conducted regarding impact of climate change on agriculture and agro based commodities; (b) if so, the details thereof; (c) whether any particular crop is more vulnerable to climate change; and (d) the steps taken to prevent the impact of climate change on agriculture sector of the country?

topic: Report of NCRB on Overcrowded Prisons
contents: Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) whether it is a fact that according to the latest Prison Statistics published by NCRB, there is a trend of overcrowding in prisons with an occupancy rate of 118 percent at the end of 2019; (b) if so, the reasons for not constructing any prisons to accommodate the increasing number of prisoners; (c) whether the Government is aware of reports of COVID-19 positive cases in several prisons which can be aggravated by the overcrowding, if so, the details thereof; and (d) whether the Government is aware of the fact that according to the report, around percent of the prisons are occupied by undertrials, if so, the measures underway to remedy the situation thereof?

Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) the details of roads constructed in kilometres under Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana (PMGSY) in Bihar particularly Jehanabad, Arwal and Gaya Districts during each of the last two years; (b) the quantum of funds sanctioned and released for the projects there under along with the status of their completion; (c) whether the roads being planned/ approved/under consideration for the upcoming projects in the State; and (d) if so, the details thereof and if not, the reasons therefor?

topic: Losses due to Rains and Floods
from: ['Thirunavukkarasar, Shri Su.', 'Selvam, Shri Ganesan', 'Raghavan, Shri M. K.', 'Vijayakumar (Alias) Vijay Vasanth , Shri', 'Annadurai, Shri C.N.', 'Kirtikar, Shri Gajanan Chandrakant', 'Ruhi, MS. Nusrat Jahan', 'Karunanidhi, Smt. Kanimozhi', 'Pon, Dr. Gautham Sigamani', 'Borlakunta, Shri Venkatesh Netha', 'Pasunoori, Shri Dayakar', 'Kumar, Shri Dhanush M', 'Reddy, Dr. Gaddam Ranjith', 'Chellakumar, Dr. A.', 'Parthiban, Shri S.R.', 'Maloth, Smt. Kavitha']
contents: Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) whether many States in the country have been affected by heavy rains and consequent flash floods, landslides, cloudbrusts, etc. in the recent months; (b) if so, whether any assessment has been made by the Government about the number of persons killed, displaced and missing along with loss of standing crops, cattle and the extent of damage to property and monetary loss, the details thereof, State/UT-wise including Telangana and Tamil Nadu and Kerala; (c) whether any Commission has been constituted to study the loss and environmental damage caused due to the incessant rain and floods and the details thereof; 77 (d) the details of proposals received from the State Governments to compensate the said losses and assistance sought, sanctioned and released by the Union Government and through NDRF and SDRF along with the criteria for it during the last three years and the current year, year-wise and State/UT-wise including Telangana, Tamil Nadu and Kerala; (e) the details of NDRF teams deployed in the affected States to take up damaged works, help farmers, etc., along with the number of persons rescued, State/ UT-wise; and (f) the measures taken to evolve a permanent mechanism to deal with such calamities and thereby ensure safety of people and property in affected States?

Will the Minister of PANCHAYATI RAJ be pleased to state: (a) the details of the grants issued to the State Government of Uttar Pradesh under different schemes of Panchayati Raj during the last three years; (b) the details of the amount of awards given to selected Panchayats of the State of Uttar Pradesh for promotion of good work under National Panchayat Award; and (c) the details of the number of Panchayats selected for their good work in the State of Uttar Pradesh, district-wise?

topic: Rural Investment and Employment Generation through SPM Rurbhan Mission
contents: Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) the details of rural investment and employment that has been generated through Shyama Prasad Mukherji Rurban Mission in rural areas; (b) the details of projects undertaken through Shyama Prasad Mukherji Rurban Mission in Chandarlapadu rurban cluster in Krishna District; and 85 (c) the details of the procedure to incorporate new projects in existing rurban clusters?

Will the Minister of FOOD PROCESSING INDUSTRIES be pleased to state: (a) the number of individual beneficiaries, Farmer Producer Organizations (FPOs), Self Help Groups (SHGs) and producer cooperatives that have accessed the PM Formalisation of Micro Food Processing Enterprises (PMFME) Scheme since its launch for capital investment, the details thereof, State-wise; (b) the percentage of beneficiaries in the rural and urban areas out of those who have availed the scheme; (c) the number of skill training workshops / sessions which have been conducted under the scheme till date; and (d) the products which have been identified for the various districts under the One District One Product (ODOP) approach of the scheme, district-wise?

topic: Collaboration for Digital Transactions under eNAM
from: ['Majumdar, Dr. Sukanta', 'Sonkar, Shri Vinod Kumar', 'Singh Deo, Smt. Sangeeta Kumari', 'Naik, Shri Raja Amareshwara', 'Singh, Shri Bhola', 'Roy, Dr. Jayanta Kumar']
contents: Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has collaborated with a private bank for National Agriculture Market (eNAM) to enable digital collections and settlement of funds to various eNAM beneficiaries in the country, if so, the details thereof; (b) the number of registered farmers and traders on eNAM and who have benefitted from the digital marketplace; (c) the total value of agri-produce traded on eNAM so far since its inception; (d) the achievements made by the Small Farmers Agri-Business Consortium (SFAC) set up as the nodal implementing agency by the Ministry since its inception; (e) whether the SFAC is implementing Central Sector Scheme (CSS) on Formation & Promotion of 10000 FPOs across the country, if so, the details thereof; and (f) the other steps being taken by the Government for development of agriculture and welfare of farmers in Bolangir constituency of Odisha?
party: ['Bharatiya Janata Party', 'Bharatiya Janata Party', 'Bharatiya Janata Party', 'Bharatiya Janata Party', 'Bharatiya Janata Party', 'Bharatiya Janata Party']

contents: Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) the details of roads constructed under the Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana (PMGSY) during each of the last three years, State/UT-wise, including in Odisha; (b) the criteria for setting road construction targets; (c) the details of financial incentives given to best performing States, particularly with regard to maintenance of roads; (d) the criteria for determining the best performing States; and (e) the status of implementation of the Electronic Maintenance of PMGSY roads (eMARG) initiative, and the details thereof?

Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) the growth in rural wages, after adjusting for inflation since January, 2014, month-wise; (b) whether the Government is of the opinion that current rural wage rates are adequate enough to maintain a rural household; (c) if so, the reasons thereto; and (d) if not, the measures being taken by the Government to increase rural wages?

topic: Killing of Civilians and Jawans by Terrorists
from: ['Vijayakumar (Alias) Vijay Vasanth , Shri', 'Thirunavukkarasar, Shri Su.', 'Parthiban, Shri S.R.']
contents: Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government is aware of the recent incidents of killing of civilians, non-Kashmiris, minority community people and jawans in Srinagar by the terrorists as also the naxal ambush in Manipur; (b) if so, the details thereof along with the number of defence / police personnel, civilians killed/injured in the incidents; 86 (c) whether any steps are being taken by the Government to protect the common man from anti-terror / naxal operations; (d) if so, the details thereof; and (e) if not, the reasons therefor?
party: ['Indian National Congress', 'Indian National Congress', 'Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam']

contents: Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government is aware that farmers suffer losses before and after harvest of crops due to various reasons including natural calamities; (b) if so, the details thereof during the last three years, State-wise; (c) the details of welfare schemes to deal with the same; and (d) the total number of affected farmers benefitted from these welfare schemes, State/district-wise?

Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) whether it is a fact that the Government has recently held a meeting with the Chief Ministers of Maoist-hit States in the country; (b) if so, the details thereof; (c) the details of the total number of incidents and deaths in the country due to Maoist related violence during the last three years, State/UT-wise; (d) whether the Government has formulated any comprehensive strategy to completely eradicate Maoist-related violence in the country; and (e) if so, the details thereof and if not, the reasons therefor?

topic: Deployment of Police during VIP Movement
contents: Will the Minister of HOME AFFAIRS be pleased to state: (a) the guidelines for closure of roads and deployment of police personnel during the movement of VIPs in Delhi; . (b) whether there is a provision in the law to ask pedestrians to step off the footpath or stop and if so, the details thereof along with the reasons therefor; and (c) the details of the steps taken by the Government to increase hassle-free security measures for VIPs?

from: ['Kalanidhi, Dr. Veeraswamy', 'Kanumuru, Shri Raghu Ramakrishna Raju', 'Prakash, Adv. Adoor']
contents: Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) the present status of the Governments plan to double farmers income by 2022 including details of the target set and achievements made so far; (b) whether the Government has conducted any annual survey to measure farm and farmers income within the country, if so, the details thereof including the last survey of farmers income; (c) whether the committee formed on doubling farmers income has submitted its report and if so, the details thereof; (d) the steps taken/proposed to be taken by the Government to overcome the challenges of low agricultural remuneration, impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on agriculture and rising prices of agricultural inputs including diesel which may hinder the Governments plan to double farmers income; and (e) the steps taken by the Government with regard to increasing the role of exports in doubling the farmers income?
party: ['Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam', 'Yuvajana Sramika Rythu Congress Party', 'Indian National Congress']

contents: Will the Minister of RURAL DEVELOPMENT be pleased to state: (a) whether the Government has any data on the number of Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Scheme (MGNREGS) new job cards issued between 2014 and 2021, if so, the details thereof, State- wise and year-wise; (b) whether the Government has data on the total number of active job cards issued and total number of active workers between 2019-2021, if so details thereof, year-wise; (c) whether there is a gap between the total number of active job cards issued and active workers, if so, the reasons therefor; (d) the reasons for persistent delays in clearing the payments to workers long after they have performed the 87 labour and who are entitled to their pay owing to a funds crunch later in the fiscal year; and (e) the steps taken by the Government to ensure that workers are paid their MNREGS wages on time?

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) whether there is a shortage of onion seeds in the country; (b) if so, whether the Government has decided not to export onion seeds; (c) if so, the reasons therefor and if not, the details of the steps taken by the Government in this regard; and (d) whether the Government provides subsidy for constructing storage facility for onions, and if so the details thereof? NEW DELHI; November 25, 2021 Agrahayana 4, 1943 (Saka) .

Will the Minister of AGRICULTURE AND FARMERS WELFARE be pleased to state: (a) the details of percentage and number of farmers covered under crop insurance before and after the inception of Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY); (b) the details of the number of farmers covered under PMFBY, State-wise and year-wise; (c) whether there is any plan to increase the number of farmers covered under PMFBY; (d) if so, the details thereof and if not the reasons therefor; (e) the details of premium collected, claims received and claims settled under PMFBY since the inception of the scheme, State-wise and year-wise; (f) whether insurance companies have not made payments to farmers in Telangana against the claims made under PMFBY; and (g) if so, the details thereof and the steps taken so far by the Government in this regard? Will the Minister of ELECTRONICS AND INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY be pleased to state: (a) the State-wise details of rural households that have been covered under Pradhan Mantri Gramin Digital Saksharta Abhiyaan (PMGDISHA) out of the six crore rural households; (b) whether marginalised sections of the society including Scheduled Castes (SCs)/Scheduled Tribes (STs), women, differently-abled persons, etc. have been enrolled and certified and if so, the details thereof; (c) whether the Standing Committee on Information Technology emphasised the need to scale up and also conduct quality impact assessments of PMGDISHA and other digital literacy programmes; and (d) if so, the action taken by the Government in this regard?

Will the Minister of RAILWAYS be pleased to state: (a) whether the Railways proposes to fast track railway lines electrification projects in the country in view of rising expenditure on fuel; (b) if so, the details and present status of ongoing projects, State-wise; (c) the details of the targets achieved so far, State- wise; and (d) the steps taken/being taken to expedite the projects, State-wise?
